skill.name: project-planning
skill.description: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept description. Use when starting a new project, when docs/planning/ contains placeholder files, or when user requests project planning document generation.
skill.summary: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept de...
skill.author: ByronWilliamsCPA

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill that generates and validates markdown planning documents. The Python validation script reads files locally within docs/planning/ only, makes no network calls, and has no code execution capabilities beyond document parsing. All capabilities align with the stated purpose of project planning document generation.

content.value_statement: Software projects suffer from architectural drift and context loss when starting new development. This skill generates four essential planning documents to maintain coherence across coding sessions and prevent costly refactoring.
actual_capabilities: Generate Project Vision and Scope document with problem, solution, and success metrics
Create Architecture Decision Records with context, alternatives, and rationale
Produce Technical Implementation Spec with tech stack, architecture, and data model
Build Development Roadmap with phases, milestones, and user stories
Validate documents using consensus review with zen-mcp-server
Synthesize all documents into actionable PROJECT-PLAN.md with git branch strategy
limitations: Generates documents only, does not implement code or create git branches itself
Requires user to provide project description and review generated content
Does not execute code or interact with external APIs directly
Templates are designed for software projects, not suitable for non-technical planning

use_cases.title: Start new projects
use_cases.description: Generate complete planning package when starting a new software project from scratch

use_cases.title: Document architecture
use_cases.description: Create formal documentation for team alignment and stakeholder communication

use_cases.title: Maintain context
use_cases.description: Provide structured context to maintain coherence across long coding sessions

prompt_templates.title: Basic project idea
prompt_templates.prompt: Plan a new project: [describe your project idea, target users, and main goals]

prompt_templates.title: Tech stack included
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate planning documents for a [project type] using [Python/JavaScript/etc] with [specific frameworks or tools]

prompt_templates.title: With constraints
prompt_templates.prompt: Create project plan with [specific timeline] and [resource constraints] for [project description]

prompt_templates.title: Full context
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate full planning package: Project is [detailed description]. Tech stack: [list]. Constraints: [list]. Timeline: [target date]

best_practices: Review each generated document for accuracy before starting implementation
Use the consensus review feature to validate document quality before proceeding
Update documents as the project evolves to maintain alignment
anti_patterns: Skipping document review and proceeding directly to implementation
Using generic placeholder text instead of project-specific content
Generating documents without considering technical constraints or timeline

faq.question: What AI tools are compatible with this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for planning and documentation tasks.

faq.question: How many documents are generated?
faq.answer: Four documents: Project Vision & Scope, Architecture Decision Record, Technical Spec, and Roadmap.

faq.question: Does this skill create git branches?
faq.answer: No, the skill generates PROJECT-PLAN.md with branch names. Use /git/milestone start to create branches.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, all document generation happens locally. No data is sent to external services.

faq.question: What if documents have errors?
faq.answer: Run scripts/validate-planning-docs.py to check for placeholders and cross-reference issues.

faq.question: How is this different from general AI prompting?
faq.answer: This skill uses structured templates, consensus review, and sequential document generation to ensure completeness.
